event.title: was born into a Jewish family in western Iran’s Kermanshah province on May 2, 1923

data.event: ARLINGTON — Jahan Nazarian was born into a Jewish family in western Iran’s Kermanshah province on May 2, 1923.
Ms. Moayyad died Saturday of complications from a stroke.

After 30 years of raising a family and practicing Baha’i in Iran, Ms. Moayyad and her husband moved to North Texas in 1973, Nadia Moayyad said, in part to be near their five children, who were all living in the United States.
After her husband died in 1992, she allowed two grandchildren to take over the store, although she still worked there for several years.
